desc: Guillaumia's baby harness, Pick-Me-Up, is a multifunctional, versatile baby product that serves as a baby walker, baby carrier, and a nursing support, all in a single design. This ultimate 3-in-1 baby gear is a unique baby item as it converts into multiple uses with a simple design.

layout.text: Save your back & give your baby freedom to move
Safely guide your baby at an arm's length.
No more bending over. With Guillaumia’s Pick-Me-Up, have an easy breezy day out with your little one.
